title: RXXKKK Men's Regular Slim Fit Jeans
description: RELAXED FIT. Built with a relaxed fit through the seat and thigh, these versatile jeans sit at the natural waist for a comfortable fit during any task. Perfect for everyday wear, this denim patchwork contrast color is a closet staple.

DURABLE MATERIALS. It's no question that this classic can withstand wear and tear. Made with durable heavyweight cotton and felled seams to prevent chafing, this original fit jean was made to last -- no matter the task.
FIVE POCKET JEAN. Keeping it classic with this traditional 5-pocket jean. Made with (2) slant pockets, (2) back patch pockets, and (1) right coin pocket.

FASHION TREND DESIGN. Nice cutting in good version style, variety of colors and styles for you to choose, personalized and unique design, hipster street style , make you look more handsome, to be the coolest guy when walking on the street.
US SIZE. Please compare the size chart to choose the right size for you. Machine wash or hand washsh or Hand Wash
